facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 26 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 14 per 100,000 live births in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 50.86 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 94.08 % of the population used a "safely managed" drinking water service—an improved source located on premises, available when needed and free from contamination

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed sanitation services (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 32.54 % of the population used a "safely managed" sanitation service—a basic facility that safely disposes of human waste

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity was 100 % in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (percent)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita was -2.25 % in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 0.43 % of GDP.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 100.0 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 1.75 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (percent)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest increased from 50.74 % in 2000 to 55.91% in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 33.98 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population
facts.fact_text: In 2017, the intentional homicide rate was 18.54 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 19.28 % of the population, up from 0.06% of the population in 2001.

facts.seriesTitle: Existence of national statistical plans that are fully funded
facts.fact_text: As of 2018, Puerto Rico has developed national statistical plans that are fully funded.
